about_the_game:
An erotic VISUAL NOVEL featuring HD graphics, steamy ANIMATIONS, and realistic-looking characters.
Meet Lily and James and join them on their quest to revitalize their marriage in a new and exciting cuckold series.
Confronted with the monotony of their routine, James encourages his wife to go out with a friend and find herself a younger man. Luckily, a hot bartender is ready to show Lily a good time.

GAME DESCRIPTION
EPISODE 1

James is unhappy with the direction of his marriage to Lily. He's haunted by memories of their passionate early days, when Lily would come home smelling of other men, and they would spend entire nights between the sheets, releasing the sexual tension between them. Now, all they do is watch the same TV series and have very vanilla lovemaking sessions, reminiscing about those wild nights.
Confronted with the monotony of their new routine, he is determined to revitalize their marriage, even if it means sharing his beautiful wife. He encourages Lily to go out with her slutty bestie and find herself a younger man.

Will Lily accept the hot bartender's offer to show her a good time?
Will James regret sending his wife into the arms of a younger man?
Follow the story and find out!

FEATURES

- HD renders and animations
- Video and image gallery

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for adults and includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. 
The characters, story, and actions are fictitious. 
All characters depicted are 18 years old and over.
Contains nudity, alternative lifestyles, graphic depictions  of oral, vaginal, anal, masturbation and non-penetrative sexual acts, bodily fluids.
Contains lesbian and straight sex scenes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
